metadata.title: EARLY ESTIMATION OF REPRODUCTION NUMBER OF COVID-19 IN VIETNAM

abstract.original_text: Reproduction number is an epidemiologic indicator that reflects the contagiousness and transmissibility of infectious agents. This paper aims to estimate the reproduction number of in the early phase of COVID-19 outbreak in Vietnam.

sentences.segment_text: Reproduction number is an epidemiologic indicator that reflects the contagiousness and transmissibility of infectious agents .
This paper aims to estimate the reproduction number of in the early phase of COVID-19 outbreak in Vietnam .
